A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lots of major issues: Where are the Nights of Ren? Really\, she's a nobody after all the hype? I could go on with the other plot holes. Why didn't Leia die? We all expected it? We all were hoping for a satisfying grand send off\, but LUKE goes?  So stupid.  The Rey/Ren thing was good.  I love them\, but they were both better written in the TFA.   The Shuttle scene was stupid and dragged out.  Poe doesn't have any remorse from having 100s of ppl get killed?  The boy with broom was stupid (why can he just do that and it took Luke a lot of training?) UGH\, so many awesome plot lines to chose from and Rian goes and does his OWN thing to be 'different'. The humor was right out of Space Balls.
